DOC.brief_title: Fast Track Laparoscopic Surgery : A Better Option Treating Colorectal Cancer Than Conventional Laparoscopic Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Method : This study blind randomize trial . 70 patient colorectal cancer undergo laparoscopic colorectal resection , divide two group . Protocols fast-track group include skip preoperative mechanical bowel preparation , early restoration diet early postoperative ambulation . Outcome measure , length hospital stay , postoperative surgical stress response ( C reactive protein ) postoperative complication compare two group .
